borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions:
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: left; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-fareast-language:EN-GB">The
proposed first-floor rear extension would by reason of the siting, size, scale,
and design dominate the rear elevation of the dwellinghouse and would fail to
respect its proportions, resulting in undue harm in
terms of character and appearance. It is also noted that the extension would
cause a material loss of daylight and outlook and it would appear as an
overbearing addition&nbsp;that would be visible from the first-floor rear
windows of No 72 and 76 Lincoln Avenue,<i> </i>RM7 0SJ. The proposed is
therefore contrary to:</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-fareast-language:EN-GB"><o:p></o:p></span></p><ul><li style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-fareast-language:EN-GB">Paragraph 130 of the National
Planning Policy Framework National Planning Policy Framework (DLUHC, July 2021)</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-fareast-language:EN-GB"><o:p></o:p></span></li><li style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-fareast-language:EN-GB">Policies D4 and D6 of the London
Plan (March 2021);</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-fareast-language:EN-GB"><o:p></o:p></span></li><li style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
